translations: 含乳脂的（creamy 的最高级）

sentences.sentence: Elsewhere, even when salt-free nuggets are made from free-range chicken breast and ices are the creamiest of the local crop, children's meals may not include vegetables.
sentences.translation: 在任何地方，甚至不含盐的鸡块是由农场放养的鸡脯做成的，冰淇淋是由本地农作物中提取的乳脂类做成的，而孩子们的膳食中可能不含蔬。
